name: Office Job (DanielJMDev)
description:
For the GJL Game Parade Game Jam, here is our take on the theme, "Carpe Diem. Seize the Day" Play as an office worker who wants to get to his evening plans, while the rest of the office try to stop him from leaving. Time to take action and escape! Fight through the enemies and take control of the situation. Time to Seize the Day!
